notesStmt.note: All the leaves more or less injured. Substantially water-damaged.
Domenico Irosolomitano (fl. 1575-1624): inscribed with his name, folio 189v, partly damaged; see 61, and appendix § 62-74.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Oriental semi-cursive scripts (different hands) of the early 16th century.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Spine: 'Josef Gikatilla. Ginnath Egoz. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Additional 27,114.'
